mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe tries to detect "wine" by calling GetProcAddress() on "wine_get_version".
(Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe starts (process #2) bitlockertogo.exe with a hidden window.
(Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe allocates a page in a foreign process with "PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE" permissions, often used to dynamically unpack code.
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe queries OS version via WMI query: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem.
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe queries OS version via WMI query: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem.
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe tries to detect antivirus software via WMI query: "SELECT * FROM AntiVirusProduct".
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe takes a screenshot using BitBlt API.
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe takes screenshots and captures keyboard.
(Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe takes screenshots and captures keyboard.

signature_matches.name: Creates a page with write and execute permissions
signature_matches.description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe allocates a page in a foreign process with "PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE" permissions, often used to dynamically unpack code.

signature_matches.name: Writes into the memory of another process
signature_matches.description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe modifies memory of (process #2) bitlockertogo.exe.

signature_matches.name: Resolves API functions dynamically
signature_matches.description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe resolves 47 API functions by name.

signature_matches.name: Creates process with hidden window
signature_matches.description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe starts (process #2) bitlockertogo.exe with a hidden window.

signature_matches.name: Tries to detect application sandbox
signature_matches.description: (Process #1) raysen hack 5.exe tries to detect "wine" by calling GetProcAddress() on "wine_get_version".

signature_matches.name: Makes indirect system call to possibly evade hooking based monitoring
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe makes an indirect system call to "NtSetInformationProcess".

signature_matches.name: Makes indirect system call to possibly evade hooking based monitoring
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe makes an indirect system call to "NtUnmapViewOfSection".

signature_matches.name: Queries OS version via WMI
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe queries OS version via WMI query: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem.

signature_matches.name: Queries a host's domain name
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe queries the host's domain name.

signature_matches.name: Takes screenshot
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe takes a screenshot using BitBlt API.

signature_matches.name: Combination of other detections shows multiple input capture behaviors
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe takes screenshots and captures keyboard.

signature_matches.name: Tries to detect the presence of antivirus software
signature_matches.description: (Process #2) bitlockertogo.exe tries to detect antivirus software via WMI query: "SELECT * FROM AntiVirusProduct".

signature_matches.name: Known clean file
signature_matches.description: Embedded file "" is a known clean file.

signature_matches.name: Malicious file detected via reputation
signature_matches.description: Reputation analysis labels the sample itself as Mal/Generic-S.
